    • Method Detail

      • getPath

        public java.lang.String getPath()

      • willWrite

        public boolean willWrite()

      • crawlWithPageLimit

        public void crawlWithPageLimit(java.lang.String seed_Url,
                               java.lang.String keyTo_Find,
                               java.lang.Integer pages_To_Crawl)
                        throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                               java.lang.InterruptedException
        Deprecated. 
        Method crawls from a given seed URL seeking a key with a user-specified limit of pages to crawl. It has been deprecated as of 2016-9-02
        Parameters:
        seed_Url - This parameter is the seed URL to begin the crawling algorithm at; first parameter passed
        keyTo_Find - This parameter is the key String to find embedded within the links; second parameter passed
        pages_To_Crawl - This parameter is the limit of pages to be crawled; third parameter passed
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - If the String representation of the URL cannot be resolved, the method throws a MalformedURLException
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the current thread is interrupted while blocked (waiting, sleeping, or otherwise occupied) the method throws an InterruptedException

      • crawlExhaustion

        public void crawlExhaustion()
                     throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                            java.io.IOException
        Instance method to crawl the given Spyder object's Seed URL to exhaustion. The supported protocols for seed_Urls are http or https
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Thrown if the current thread is interrupted abruptly while blocked
        java.io.IOException - Thrown with invalid input

      • crawl

        public void crawl(java.lang.String currentURL)
           throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                  java.io.IOException
        Individual crawling method to parse an HTML Document of passed URL
        Parameters:
        currentURL - String representation of current URL to be crawled
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - will be thrown if current thread is abruptly interrupted while sleeping or waiting
        java.io.IOException - will be thrown if input cannot be resolved

      • writeHitList

        public void writeHitList()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Method to write our list of URLs that contain the user's key String into a user-given File as determined through an absolute directory path passed through the GUI.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown through the use of File object manipulation if needed.
